short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Delivering daily evangelical inspiration and motivation in New Tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The perfect companion for any Christian.
This extension provides you with a daily, curated bible passage and wallpaper to help you stay inspired and motivated with your evangelical journey with each New Tab you open.

Customisable to suit your preferred bible translation including NIV, ASV, ESV and KJV.


Features
¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯
► Curated selection of bible passages
► Click-through bible passage to read more with YouVersion or Bible Gateway
► Beautiful landscape imagery via Unsplash or Pexels
► Click-through to learn more about showcased artists
► Automatically updates every day
► Saves option preferences


Future Updates
¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯
► Cross-browser compatibility
